org.osgi.cdi.api.extension
Interface ServiceRegistry

public interface ServiceRegistry

This interface represents a service registry where all OSGi services may be handled.

It allows to:

  • Register a service implementation with a service, getting back the corresponding Registration,

  • Obtain the service implementations list as a Service.

Author:
Mathieu ANCELIN - SERLI (mathieu.ancelin@serli.com), Matthieu CLOCHARD - SERLI (matthieu.clochard@serli.com)
See Also:
Service, Registration

Method Detail

registerService

<T> Registration<T> registerService(Class<T> contract,
                                    Class<? extends T> implementation)
Register a service implementation.

Type Parameters:
T - the service type.
Parameters:
contract - the service contract interface.
implementation - the service implementation class.
Returns:
the new service Registration or null if the registration goes wrong.

getServiceReferences

<T> Service<T> getServiceReferences(Class<T> contract)
Get available service implementations of a service.

Type Parameters:
T - the service type.
Parameters:
contract - the service contract interface that implementations are requested.
Returns:
the available service implementations as a Service or null if there is no such implementation.
